entry.title: Fans wait to hear word on Miley Cyrus St. Louis show after KC cancellation - STLtoday.com
entry.content:
SFGate
Fans wait to hear word on Miley Cyrus St. Louis show after KC cancellation
STLtoday.com
Miley Cyrus' St. Louis fans are probably on pins and needles right now. Her concert Tuesday night at the Sprint Center in Kansas City was canceled. The singer is hospitalized due to a severe allergic reaction. Cyrus is scheduled to perform tonight in St. Louis.
